title: Print, "Repast of the Hunters", early 1740s
medium: Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper
inscribed: At bottom, right of center, inreverse: "Scotin Le jeune"; bottom margin: "A. PEYROTTE inv."; "N. 12"; 'charpentier au Coq. avec privilege du Roy."
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Two hunters rest beneath trees and are served by a turbaned boy. Another hunter fires at a small animal in the right background. Two dogs in the foreground. Castle in the distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Repast of the Hunters", early 1740s.
early 1740s. Hand-colored etching with watercolor on paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1921-22-279.
